EmailTemplate.description: State Supervisor return to County specialist for JFS programs
EmailTemplate.name: JFS Amendments State Supervisor Returns to Specialist
EmailTemplate.subject: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.RecordType} Request Returned to Specialist for Revision
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.RecordType} Request for {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} was returned to the assigned specialist for revisions on {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Transaction_Status_Date__c} . To view the details of this request, log into OCLQS.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
